description: These fragrant lemongrass scented pork lettuce cups make a tasty starter or light lunch.
name: Thai Style Pork Lettuce Cups Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 spring onions, sliced, green tops reserved

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large pan on medium high heat and cook the spring onions, garlic and chilli for 2 minutes.
Add the pork mince and cook for 10 minutes, until browned and cooked through.
Stir in the lime juice and zest, lemongrass paste, fish sauce and half of the mint and cook 2 minutes.
Separate the lettuce leaves by slicing off the root and arrange on a platter. Fill each lettuce cup with the pork mix, top with extra fresh mint, spring onion tops and chilli and serve.
